pkgmetadata.longdescription: Supports decompression of files compressed using all known DMS compression modes, including old and obsolete ones, and also encrypted files, for 100% compatibility. Can test DMS files integrity, view file informations and show attached Banners and FILEID.DIZ . Can generate standard disk images and compressed disk images, using gzip, if you want to store your files in ADF or ADZ formats. Can extract the files contained inside the DMS archives, if the compressed disk is an AmigaDOS disk, using readdisk made by Bernd Schmidt. Can process multiple files in batch with a single command, and also use stdin and stdout for input and output of data.
